attributes.action: The same level of support needs to be given to small businesses.
attributes.additional_details: At the current rate of financial loss there is no chance of many small businesses surviving this third lockdown. Please give the same level of support as was given during the first lockdown.
attributes.background: Give the same level of support that was given to small businesses during the first lockdown. The current level is not enough for those that have been forced to close.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329210

Since you started your petition the Government has announced £4.6 billion in new lockdown grants to support businesses and protect jobs: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/46-billion-in-new-lockdown-grants-to-support-businesses-and-protect-jobs
